page.title: 11Walberton-Resident's Jobs
page.content:
Based on the occupations of the parents of the school-children Walberton is largely a dormitory village. Most of the parents working locally are in horticulture or agriculture, but more than 75% of parents work outside the village.
The following list will give an idea of the ocupations followed:_ local government, fire service, police, doctor, farmer, grower under glass, Royal Navy, lecturer, teacher, publican, representatives, carpenter, draughtsmen, carpenter, plumber, electrician, etc. The large 'middle-class' proportion is representative of the village makeup.
Several mothers work part-time, many in the local glass-houses.
